ygData.subject: RE: Cleric Behaviour
ygData.msgSnippet: Does anyone know how to remove yourself on the list? ... From: Greg McTague [mailto:gmctague@independent-telecom.com] Sent: Monday, August 23, 1999 10:30 AM
ygData.messageBody:
Does anyone know how to remove yourself on the list?


-----Original Message-----
From: Greg McTague [mailto:gmctague@...]
Sent: Monday, August 23, 1999 10:30 AM
To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Cleric Behaviour


From: Greg McTague <gmctague@...>

It is writtien under your persona and stats. Upper right -hand corner.


Red Gneiss

-----Original Message-----
From: Sumadora ' [mailto:sumadora@...]
Sent: Saturday, August 21, 1999 3:11 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Cleric Behaviour


From: "Sumadora '" <sumadora@...>

I for get what diety I chose to follow. Is there a way to find out?

Sumadora
ECI server


> > I thought most clerics were good natured hehe. I did not realize that
>there
> > were evil clerics.
> >
>
>Alas, the vile gods of darkness have their mendicants; as a follower of
>Tunare, I use my powers to heal and protect Tunare's most beloved
>children, the elves. However, I feel no compunction to show mercy to
>the bastard child of the Marr twins, nor to help the stunted followers
>of the gods of mayhem and dirt-delving.
